Check the air pressure

Check the cylindrical travel

Check if the brake is too tight or too loosen
Check the tool sleeve's tolerance
Arm not back to zero, adjust the arm screw to ZERO point, when the power on is ok

patterns: Arm tool magazine not drawing back

Press 'O.T.REL' key, use the handwheel rotate the axis to reverse direction
Check if the limit switch is broken.

responses: Check the limit switch is right set in the software or not
Adjust or replace the ZERO block or SWITCH
Clean the axis cover
Change the bearing
If it is from Z axis, check it is loosen for the hammer and guide way is loosen or not. Check if the hammer chain and guide wheel is wearing or not.
Lubricate the spindle belt
Adjust the belt tension
Replace the spindle belt or spindle.

Input water to exclude the air inside the coolan tank

Adjust or replace the valve.
Replace the pump.
Emergency stop - Check if X8.4 is written or not

Lubrication oil alarm - input the oil or replace the pump

patterns: ToolMagazine back home signal cannot be found - choose function
responses: ToolMagazine back home signal cannot be found - Check the sensor switch

patterns: Tool magazine motor is over loaded
responses: Tool magazine motor is overloaded - Check the thermal relay inside the electric cabinet
Coolant motor overloaded - Check the thermal relay inside the electric cabinet
Chip conveyor motor overloaded - Check the thermal relay inside the electric cabinet
T code error - check T code
Spindle is not positioned - Move Z axis downward manually until the alarm disappear

patterns: The arm is NOT in the middel poisiton
responses: No signal for the arm - Chheck if the sensors are broken or not
The arm is not in middle position - Move the arm manually

patterns: 1019. Z AXIS NOT IN ATC POSITION
responses: Z axis can't reach ATC - check if the 2nd home point of Z axis signal F96.2 is right or not
